subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Islanders beat the N.H.L.-best Dallas Stars on Sunday. Anders Lee had a goal and an assist, and Mikhail Grabovski also scored to help the Islanders win for the fourth time in six games.
snippet: The Islanders beat the N.H.L.-best Dallas Stars on Sunday. Anders Lee had a goal and an assist, and Mikhail Grabovski also scored to help the Islanders win for the fourth time in six games.
